text: He picked a twist from a bush of myrrh, and pleased with the pleasure of his little ones he did not decide to leave it. A bird hunter noticed the tortoise was getting used to the place and hunted it down. And when the tortoise saw his near end, he said: O you miserable! For the pleasure of eating, I have deprived myself of life. You never go overboard in pleasures.
title: El tordo
author: nan Esopo
